channel.title: Minikube-Install on Trevorch
channel.description: Recent content in Minikube-Install on Trevorch

item.title: 安装&及基本使用
item.description: 下载kubectl & minikube https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/v1.18.0/bin/windows/amd64/kubectl.exe https://github.com/kubernetes/minikube/releases/download/v1.9.2/minikube-windows-amd64.exe 安装virtualbox 设置环境变量 指定minikube集群的存储位置 MINIKUBE_HOME = F:\minikube 创建并启动kubernetes集群 minikube start
